profile.name: Sophie Alpert

profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with expertise in React, Python, and TypeScript. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions with a focus on scalability and maintainability.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Brex as a potential employer for Sophie Alpert.
